name: topaz
description: Guidance for Topaz fine-grained, relationship-based authorization. USE FOR: fine-grained permissions, relationship-based access control (ReBAC), Google Zanzibar-style authorization, directory-based identity resolution, policy-as-code with OPA/Rego, hierarchical permission models (owner > editor > viewer). DO NOT USE FOR: simple RBAC (use Casbin/Enforcer), authentication (use ASP.NET Core Identity), input sanitization (use Hygiene), or encryption (use CryptoNet).
author: Tyler-R-Kendrick
